title: How would you launch (roll out) Amazon Go?
Would you want to launch a fitness app for Facebook? If yes, why? Please elaborate all requirements and prioritizations.
Suppose Uber is about to launch Uber Grocery. Walk me through it from 0-1.
Launch Google Maps for a new region.
Lyft wants to enter the Indian market. What should be the strategy?

What will be the strategy to launch a product that already captured around 70-80% of the students market? The catch is "As the students are graduating, new students are also coming in." Take an online furniture rental company for reference.
Launch Uber in a new city.
We launched in South Africa in 2018, but let's say we didn't. How would you lead a launch into that region?
How would you launch a social fitness device?

You are a product manager of an app which consumers use for requesting barber service. The business wants to address another problem through the same app (which is ordering water bottle-20L). Will you develop another feature within the same app? Will you develop another app to address this? How would you arrive to this decision?
You're the PM at a pharmaceutical company. How would you go about launching a new sleeping pill?
If a smart scientist found a way to make teleportation work, how would you market it?
Facebook wants to change privacy settings from Friends, to Friends and Friends that are tagged. How would you convince Mark Zuckerberg this is not a good idea?
If the customer refuses to accept the new product, how will you handle it?
How would you launch Google Home in Canada?
What factors need to be considered if you want to launch your product in a new market?
Design an MVP experience for a real-estate investment app.
How do you launch a college student checking account at Capitol One?
Dunzo wants to enter T3/T4 cities in India. If you are the product manager driving this expansion, how would you go about it?

Imagine you're helping the marketing team to identify opportunities to launch EVE (the first electrical Vertical Take-Off and Landing vehicle) in the country. How would you choose the city to start the operation? What kind of studies would you do to choose the city?
How would you launch Google’s driverless car service?
How do you prepare for a beta launch?
Suppose Uber decides to launch UberEats in a few new cities. How do you choose which cities to launch?
Amazon wants to enter the e-learning market. What should be the strategy?
Is there a market for an App for Senior Citizens so participants can meet and read daily news from specific newspapers?
How would you approach launching Zomato in a new country?
Imagine you have developed a toothbrush that will last a lifetime for a user. How will you price it?
How would you go about launching a "video message" functionality in a communication app that gets used by over 100 million users?
Suppose Nike wants to start a subscription shoe service. How would you size the market opportunity and validate it?
What would you do if you were the PM of a cryptocurrency exchange that wants to start offering lending services?
Should Amazon launch a smartphone?
How would you relaunch Google Glasses?
How would you launch a product to teach programming languages for older people in India? What would be the potential market size for the product?
You are a PM at Google and you need to launch Google Analytics. What's next?
Build and launch Uber for Events. Focus on rides to/from large events (10,000+ attendees) and create a magical experience for riders and drivers.
You are the PM for express delivery for an online pharmacy. What will you do before launching it in a new city?
Microsoft is thinking of launching a premium color version of the Surface Pro tablet. How would you quantify the benefits of this service?
How will you plan the launch of a travel product after the end of coronavirus?
How would you launch electric bikes directly to consumers?
Come up with a strategy to launch Swiggy Go in Kamla Nagar, Delhi.
What should be the Go to Market strategy for driverless cars?
Launch a strategy for Uber for one city.
You are the PM in charge of product launch of Enterprise SAAS Solution. How would you go about it?
How do you improve the Capital One online application flow?
Describe a product you think had a successful launch and why?
How can you determine the effect a feature will have on product adoption before launching it?
What are the factors to be considered for a pay to play social gaming app to enter into new markets?
Amazon is interested in entering the Home Improvement services market, What MVP would you launch?
If you had a product that could teleport people, how would you do the product launch?
What steps would you take to open a pet food store in Evanston?
What makes a successful product launch?
How would you go about introducing Whole Foods into the Amazon catalog?
How would you approach the task of launching an OTT (Over-the-Top) product if the CEO of Ola Cabs requested it?
If the CEO of Zomato asked you, as a product manager, to launch a grocery product, how would you approach it?
You are the owner of a new battery tech company. What is your go-to-market plan?
Design and prepare a go-to-market strategy for a cab scheduling feature for Lyft.
How would you launch an MLOps product?
